# The `OMPContext` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The context for a source location is made up of active property traits, e.g., device=&#123;kind(host)&#125;, and constructs traits which describe the nesting in OpenMP constructs at the location. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::omp::OMPContext</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The context for a source location is made up of active property traits, e.g., device=&#123;kind(host)&#125;, and constructs traits which describe the nesting in OpenMP constructs at the location.

Definition at line 157 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/openmp/ompcontext-h">OMPContext.h</a>.

### matchesISATrait() {#a82d9730d0ab814de2b2daea54724a02f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::omp::OMPContext::matchesISATrait (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Hook for users to check if an ISA trait matches.

The trait is described as the string that got parsed and it depends on the target and context if this matches or not.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/openmp/ompcontext-h/#l00173">173</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/frontend/include/llvm/frontend/openmp/ompcontext-h">OMPContext.h</a>.
